name: Affiliate Lease
overview:
Affiliate Lease provides customizable websites for affiliate marketing complete with product integration from affiliate networks.

The product includes hosting, domain name registration, and is intended to allow aspiring affiliate marketers to build professional websites used in competitive industries at the most cost-efficient means possible. There are two different subscription types as they operate under the SAAS umbrella: monthly and yearly.

Products and offers that publishers may promote are populated on their websites through feeds provided by affiliate networks. Affiliate Lease does not get involved with the relationship between publishers and affiliate networks. They strictly provide the websites that connect the two. This allows publishers to maximize their ROI as they are not having their commissions stepped on. It also allows the affiliate networks providing the feeds to expand their base of publishers.

The Affiliate Lease business model is based on retention. Because they offer month to month subscriptions, continual development and product enhancements are ongoing and launched on a quarterly schedule. Included in development and building relationships with other networks to expand the offers available.

Affiliate Lease also has an affiliate program of their own to allow publishers to promote their brand. Because the company is backed by former affiliates, the program has a very liberal advertising restrictions and offers high commission structures.
